title: Kindergarten Multimodal Learning Design Expert Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of kindergarten curriculum and teaching-learning methods, experience with digital educational tools
context.additional_context: Practice-centered training program for pre-service elementary and kindergarten teachers, emphasizing enhanced competency in designing multimodal learning linked to science curricula

learning_goals: Apply the principle of multiple representations (text, images, manipulative activities, etc.) to the design of science curriculum activities.
Design a kindergarten science inquiry activity plan using the learning stations approach.
Organize multimodal learning activities suitable for early childhood developmental stages according to the integrated learning trajectory principle.
Design and evaluate a kindergarten science learning environment that integrates digital and physical resources.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
